# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

Adjust image quality settings for movies.

To display image quality settings, press **MENU/OK** in the movie shooting display and select the !Image Quality Setting Menu tab.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The options available vary with the shooting mode selected.

## FILM SIMULATION

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 132).

## MONOCHROMATIC COLOR

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 134).
